item.description:
Hi have not been roller skating in about 20 years thought it would be fun to see if I still can.
I looked for adult only night but They no longer hold them anywhere. I picked this place because it seems like a central location.Hope you can attend


5 Highland Park Ave, Hudson, Ma 01749


Take Rt. 495 to exit 26 (Rt. 62 E) Take a right at the end of the ramp. Roller Kingdom is 3/4 mile on your right. (Turn right on Highland Park Ave.)
From Sudbury, Wayland, Weston take Rt. 20 to Rt. 27 to Hudson Road. Follow Hudson Road (which turns into Rt. 62 W) to Hudson Rotary and follow the sign which says 62W to 495, Roller Kingdom is approximately 1-1/2 miles on your left, directly past the Dodge auto dealership. Turn left on Highland Park Ave.

From Marlboro, take Rt 85 N to Hudson Rotary. Follow the sign to 62W to 495. Roller Kingdom is approximately 1-1/2 miles on the left. Turn left on Highland Park Ave.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy in the middle of the rink in pain
item.name: Roller Skating
